chapters.title: Chapter 10:  A Blazing Beacon
chapters.info:
Siswai,
      p. 275 (324)—Aviendha's
      gray mare.  Her name means “spear” in the Old Tongue.
      She is more spirited a mount than Elayne would have
      chosen for her sister, but when Aviendha learned the mare's name she
      would have no other.
